name: Critter Deck
description:
## Round ‘Em Up!

There’s a herd of critters waiting to make a shadowrunner’s life more difficult and altogether more interesting, and any runner who wants to stay alive should know about them. The Critter Deck rounds up dozens of critters from all sorts of environments to help keep you in the know. With game stats and art for each critter, you can get familiar with beasts fuzzy, scaly, slimy, and any other texture you can think of!
